ygData.subject: RE: Bard meditate skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Meditate works automatically for speeding up spell remem times.  My guess is our button won t work so we cannot gain any meditate benefit on mana refresh.  Of
ygData.messageBody:
Meditate works automatically for speeding up spell remem times. My guess is
our button won't work so we cannot gain any meditate benefit on mana
refresh. Of course how that would matter above level 35 where it is
automatic when you sit I don't know.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2000 1:14 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bard meditate skill


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

I've never played a character with meditate skill so I have no idea how it
actually works. Now that we have it, are we supposed to click on the
Meditate button on the spellbook right after we start memorizing a new song
or does it kick in automatically?

I'm not going to be able to play again until the weekend so would appreciate
someone providing some feedback on how this new skill helps us out in
combat. What I'm hoping is that we can now memorize songs fast enough to
where, if in the middle of a tough combat and you realize you don't have the
song memmed that is best suited for that particular combat, we can back out,
sit down (assuming we aren't getting attacked) , and memorize a new song
that is beneficial for that combat.

Galtin of E'ci
